last_episode_to_air.name: Demolition Derby Cabin
last_episode_to_air.overview: A bedroom is designed to fit under the stairs of a mountaintop cabin.

name: Building Wild
overview: National Geographic Channel goes off the map to kick off its first do-it-yourself series, Building Wild. Paulie, as he is known, has partnered with woodsman and master fabricator Pat "Tuffy" Bakaitis on a cabin design and construction business called Cabin Kings. These "Cabin Kings" are construction's odd couple: Paulie is a city boy at heart and Tuffy is a gruff, logical woodsman who has never heard of Starbucks. But together, this duo creates unbelievable wilderness getaways, transforming discarded materials into fabulous contraptions and overcoming outrageous building challenges along the way.

episodes.name: Dirty Dozen Deer Lodge
episodes.overview: Paulie and Tuffy help the "Dirty Dozen" transform a decrepit old barn into a new hunting retreat.

episodes.name: Movable Beast
episodes.overview: The guys convert a cargo truck into a cabin on wheels while setting up a woodland retreat for an ex-military man and his family.

episodes.name: Spinning Cabin
episodes.overview: A revolving cabin is created using a power-operated shovel as its pivot point.

episodes.name: License to Mill
episodes.overview: A retreat for a retired veterinarian is built.

episodes.name: Log Jam
episodes.overview: The guys build a cabin using only recycled materials found on site at a family-owned logging business.

episodes.name: Backwoods Bus
episodes.overview: The guys help a teacher and novice builder construct his cabin. Included: a school bus recycled into guest quarters; an outside dining area.

episodes.name: Tuff Enough
episodes.overview: The team transform a shipping container into a cabin and attempt to set it up on a muddy mountainside locale.

episodes.name: Double Decker Cabin
episodes.overview: A cabin is constructed over muddy land for a podiatrist who's also an outdoor-sports enthusiast.

episodes.name: Float My Cabin
episodes.overview: The guys build a large camouflaged shelter for a biologist and his uncle in the middle of a swamp. The two plan to use the man-sized eagle's nest to observe nature.

episodes.name: Top of the World
episodes.overview: The guys build a chalet at the top of a ski slope for a father and son who enjoy winter sports.

episodes.name: Tailgating Paradise
episodes.overview: The Cabin Kings tackle their largest-ever build — a 1,350-square-foot cabin at the top of a mountain for a larger-than-life New York Jets fan. Their client, Sean Winters, wants a place where he and his team of family and friends can tailgate during Jets away games and enjoy his massive property’s 17 miles of trails on their ATVs and snowmobiles.

episodes.name: Waterfall Cabin
episodes.overview: Ain't no mountain high enough, as Paulie and Tuffy struggle to build a mountaintop cabin over a waterfall. Their clients have long dreamed of a cabin that takes advantage of their property's incredible view of the Hudson River Valley.

episodes.name: Floating Getaway
episodes.overview: Father and son fishing fanatics demand a cabin that can sail out onto their family pond. The Cabin Kings must hustle to keep their dream of a floating cabin afloat.

episodes.name: Marble Getaway
episodes.overview: Stone from a 100-year-old quarry is used to build a cabin for a client in Vermont.

episodes.name: Hilltop Hangar
episodes.overview: An aviation-themed cabin is built on a hilltop for a pilot.

episodes.name: Treehouse Cabin
episodes.overview: The guys build a tree house cabin in a maple tree for a man in Vermont.

episodes.name: Maple Syrup Motor Club
episodes.overview: The guys build a sugar shack and bar for a couple in New York who are looking to get back into making maple syrup.

episodes.name: Brewhouse Cabin
episodes.overview: A cabin is built for a craft brewer and his farmer father in Hoosick Falls, New York.

episodes.name: Collector's Cabin
episodes.overview: A father and son look to incorporate their antiques and collectibles into the design of a new cabin.

episodes.name: Demolition Derby Cabin
episodes.overview: A bedroom is designed to fit under the stairs of a mountaintop cabin.
